name: @icodewith-ai/treex
description: Advanced tree structure visualizer & exporter with emoji support

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public && git push && git push --tags && git checkout dev && git merge main && git push
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public && git push && git push --tags && git checkout dev && git merge main && git push
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish --access public && git push && git push --tags && git checkout dev && git merge main && git push
